definitions.definition: Uncommon , rare; difficult to find; insufficient to meet a demand .
examples: By the end of the 20th century elephants had become scarce even in Africa.
definitions.label_groups: chiefly of resources, such as food

definitions.definition: Scantily supplied (with); deficient (in); used with of .

main_definition: ( chiefly of resources, such as food ) Uncommon , rare; difficult to find; insufficient to meet a demand .
secondary_definitions: Scantily supplied (with); deficient (in); used with of .
